sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(SALEID) AS CNT FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND CHGGUBUN = '004'

SELECT T3.MANAGENO, T3.CITYCODE, (SELECT IN1.BRANCHCODE FROM hr_insamst IN1 WHERE IN1.INSACODE = T1.SALERCD) AS BRANCHCODE, T3.ADDRESS, T3.OWNERNAME, T3.OWNERJUMINID, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONM2), 0) AS CONM2 FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGM2), 0) AS HOLDINGM2 FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID)) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONBM2, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(IN2.BUYM2, 0) AS BUYM2 FROM mm_buymst IN2 WHERE IN2.BUYID = T1.BUYID) - ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONM2), 0) AS CONM2 FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGM2), 0) AS HOLDINGM2 FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID))) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONJM2, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONPY), 0) AS CONPY FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGPY), 0) AS HOLDINGPY FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID)) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONBPY, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(IN2.BUYPY, 0) AS BUYPY FROM mm_buymst IN2 WHERE IN2.BUYID = T1.BUYID) - ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONPY), 0) AS CONPY FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGPY), 0) AS HOLDINGPY FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID))) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONJPY, T1.SALEID, T1.SALEDATE, T1.SALEGUBUN, T1.SALERCD, T1.BUYID, T1.CONNAME, T1.CONJUMINID, T1.CONADDRESS, T1.CONTELNO, T1.CONM2, T1.CONPY, T1.REMARK, T2.SALEAMT, T2.SALEDANGA, T2.DCGUBUN, T2.DCRATE, T2.DCAMT, T2.SELLAMT, T2.AGENCYAMT, T2.JOINYN, T2.REGYN, T2.REGDATE, T2.CANCELYN, T2.CANCELDATE FROM sa_salemst T1, sa_saledtl T2, mm_buymst T3 WHERE T1.SALEID = T2.SALEID AND T1.BUYID = T3.BUYID
AND T1.SALEDATE BETWEEN #SL_SALEDATE_FR# AND #SL_SALEDATE_TO#
AND T1.SALERCD = #SALERCD#
AND T3.ADDRESS LIKE '%$ADDRESS$%'
ORDER BY T1.SALEDATE DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sa_salemst SET SALEDATE = #SALEDATE#, SALEGUBUN = #SALEGUBUN#, SALERCD = #SALERCD#, BUYID = #BUYID#, CONNAME = #CONNAME#, CONJUMINID = #CONJUMINID#, CONADDRESS = #CONADDRESS#, CONTELNO = #CONTELNO#, CONM2 = #CONM2#, CONPY = #CONPY#, REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERID#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#

UPDATE sa_saledtl SET SALEAMT = #SALEAMT#, SALEDANGA = #SALEDANGA#, DCGUBUN = #DCGUBUN#, DCRATE = #DCRATE#, DCAMT = #DCAMT#, SELLAMT = #SELLAMT#,
AGENCYAMT = NULL
AGENCYAMT = #AGENCYAMT#
WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT (SELECT CONCAT('SA', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(SALEID, 7, 4)), 0) + 1, 4, 0)) AS SALEID FROM sa_salemst T1 WHERE SUBSTR(SALEID, 3, 4) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m') ) AS SALEID_PK FROM dual
INSERT INTO sa_salemst ( SALEID, SALEDATE, SALEGUBUN, SALERCD, BUYID, CONNAME, CONJUMINID, CONADDRESS, CONTELNO, CONM2, CONPY, REMARK, INSERTUSER ) VALUES ( #SALEID_PK#, #SALEDATE#, #SALEGUBUN#, #SALERCD#, #BUYID#, #CONNAME#, #CONJUMINID#, #CONADDRESS#, #CONTELNO#, #CONM2#, #CONPY#, #REMARK#, #USERID# )

INSERT INTO sa_saledtl ( SALEID, SALEAMT, SALEDANGA, DCGUBUN, DCRATE, DCAMT, SELLAMT, AGENCYAMT ) VALUES ( #SALEID#, #SALEAMT#, #SALEDANGA#, #DCGUBUN#, #DCRATE#, #DCAMT#, #SELLAMT#,
NULL
#AGENCYAMT#
)
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(SALEID) AS CNT FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#
SELECT COUNT(SALEID) AS CNT FROM sa_jointnametb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#
SELECT COUNT(SALEID) AS CNT FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#

SELECT T1.SALEID, T1.IPGUMSEQ, (SELECT T3.DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl T3 WHERE T3.CCODE = '009' AND T3.DCODE = T1.DEPOSITGUBUN) AS DEPOSITGUBUN, T1.DEPOSITDATE, T1.DEPOSITAMT, T1.DEPOSITYN, T1.REMARK, T2.IPGUMID, T2.SEQ, T2.SUGUMAMT FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb T1 LEFT JOIN sa_ipgumdtl T2 ON T1.SALEID = T2.SALEID AND T1.IPGUMSEQ = T2.IPGUMSEQ WHERE 1=1 AND T1.SALEID = #SALEID# ORDER BY T1.IPGUMSEQ
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sa_ipgumscheduletb SET DEPOSITGUBUN = #DEPOSITGUBUN#, DEPOSITDATE = #DEPOSITDATE#, DEPOSITAMT = #DEPOSITAMT#, REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERID#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND IPGUMSEQ = #IPGUMSEQ#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sa_ipgumscheduletb ( SALEID, IPGUMSEQ, DEPOSITGUBUN, DEPOSITDATE, DEPOSITAMT, REMARK, INSERTUSER ) VALUES( #SALEID#, (SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(T1.IPGUMSEQ), 0) + 1, 3, 0) AS IPGUMSEQ FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb T1 WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#), #DEPOSITGUBUN#, #DEPOSITDATE#, #DEPOSITAMT#, #REMARK#, #USERID# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND IPGUMSEQ = #IPGUMSEQ#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.SALEID, T1.JOINTSEQ, T1.JOINTNAME, T1.JOINTJUMINID, T1.JOINTTELNO, T1.OCCUM2, T1.OCCUPY, T1.SALEAMT, T1.SELLDANGA, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl T2 WHERE CCODE = '008' AND T2.DCODE = T1.DCGUBUN) AS DCGUBUN, T1.DCRATE, T1.SELLAMT, T1.PAPERREGYN, T1.REMARK FROM sa_jointnametb T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.SALEID = #SALEID# ORDER BY T1.JOINTSEQ
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE sa_saledtl SET JOINYN = #JOINYN#, REGYN = #REGYN#,
REGDATE = NULL
REGDATE = #REGDATE#
WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#

UPDATE sa_jointnametb SET JOINTNAME = #JOINTNAME#, JOINTJUMINID = #JOINTJUMINID#, JOINTTELNO = #JOINTTELNO#, OCCUM2 = #OCCUM2#, OCCUPY = #OCCUPY#, SALEAMT = #SALEAMT#, SELLDANGA = #SELLDANGA#, DCGUBUN = #DCGUBUN#, DCRATE = #DCRATE#, SELLAMT = #SELLAMT#, PAPERREGYN = #PAPERREGYN#, REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERID#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND JOINTSEQ = #JOINTSEQ#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sa_jointnametb ( SALEID, JOINTSEQ, JOINTNAME, JOINTJUMINID, JOINTTELNO, OCCUM2, OCCUPY, SALEAMT, SELLDANGA, DCGUBUN, DCRATE, SELLAMT, PAPERREGYN, REMARK, INSERTUSER ) VALUES( #SALEID#, (SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(T1.JOINTSEQ), 0) + 1, 3, 0) AS JOINTSEQ FROM sa_jointnametb T1 WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#), #JOINTNAME#, #JOINTJUMINID#, #JOINTTELNO#, #OCCUM2#, #OCCUPY#, #SALEAMT#, #SELLDANGA#, #DCGUBUN#, #DCRATE#, #SELLAMT#, #PAPERREGYN#, #REMARK#, #USERID# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM sa_jointnametb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND JOINTSEQ = #JOINTSEQ#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.SALEID, T1.SALESEQ, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl T2 WHERE T2.CCODE = '010' AND T2.DCODE = T1.CHGGUBUN) AS CHGGUBUN, T1.CHGDATE, T1.PREM2, T1.PREPY, T1.CHGM2, T1.CHGPY, T1.REMARK FROM sa_salehistorytb T1 WHERE T1.SALEID = #SALEID# ORDER BY T1.SALESEQ
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE sa_salehistorytb SET CHGGUBUN = #CHGGUBUN#, CHGDATE = #CHGDATE#,
PREM2 = #PREM2#,
PREPY = #PREPY#,
CHGM2 = #CHGM2#,
CHGPY = #CHGPY#,
REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERID#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND SALESEQ = #SALESEQ#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO sa_salehistorytb ( SALEID, SALESEQ, CHGGUBUN, CHGDATE,
PREM2,
PREPY,
CHGM2,
CHGPY,
REMARK, INSERTUSER ) VALUES( #SALEID#, (SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(T1.SALESEQ), 0) + 1, 3, 0) AS SALESEQ FROM sa_salehistorytb T1 WHERE SALEID = #SALEID#), #CHGGUBUN#, #CHGDATE#,
#PREM2#,
#PREPY#,
#CHGM2#,
#CHGPY#,
#REMARK#, #USERID# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE SALEID = #SALEID# AND SALESEQ = #SALESEQ#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T3.MANAGENO, (SELECT CITYNAME FROM ba_citymst BA1 WHERE BA1.CITYCODE = T3.CITYCODE) AS CITYCODE, (SELECT IN1.BRANCHCODE FROM hr_insamst IN1 WHERE IN1.INSACODE = T1.SALERCD) AS BRANCHCODE, T3.ADDRESS, T3.OWNERNAME, T3.OWNERJUMINID, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONM2), 0) AS CONM2 FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGM2), 0) AS HOLDINGM2 FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID)) AS CHAR) AS CONBM2, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(IN2.BUYM2, 0) AS BUYM2 FROM mm_buymst IN2 WHERE IN2.BUYID = T1.BUYID) - ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONM2), 0) AS CONM2 FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGM2), 0) AS HOLDINGM2 FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID))) AS CHAR) AS CONJM2, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONPY), 0) AS CONPY FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGPY), 0) AS HOLDINGPY FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID)) AS CHAR) AS CONBPY, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(IN2.BUYPY, 0) AS BUYPY FROM mm_buymst IN2 WHERE IN2.BUYID = T1.BUYID) - ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONPY), 0) AS CONPY FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGPY), 0) AS HOLDINGPY FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID))) AS CHAR) AS CONJPY, T1.SALEID, T1.SALEDATE, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl SY1 WHERE SY1.CCODE = '007' AND SY1.DCODE = T1.SALEGUBUN) AS SALEGUBUN, T1.SALERCD, T1.BUYID, T1.CONNAME, T1.CONJUMINID, T1.CONADDRESS, T1.CONTELNO, T1.CONM2, T1.CONPY, T1.REMARK, T2.SALEAMT, T2.SALEDANGA, T2.DCGUBUN, T2.DCRATE, T2.DCAMT, T2.SELLAMT, T2.AGENCYAMT, T2.JOINYN, T2.REGYN, T2.REGDATE, T2.CANCELYN, T2.CANCELDATE FROM sa_salemst T1, sa_saledtl T2, mm_buymst T3 WHERE T1.SALEID = T2.SALEID AND T1.BUYID = T3.BUYID
AND T1.SALEDATE = #SALEDATE#
ORDER BY T1.SALEDATE, T1.SALEID DESC

SELECT A1.BUYID, A1.BUYDATE, A1.BUYGUBUN, A1.MANAGENO, A1.CITYCODE, A1.CITYNAME, A1.BOROUGHCODE, A1.BOROUGHNAME, A1.USETYPE, A1.ADDRESS, A1.OWNERNAME, A1.OWNERJUMINID, A1.CONBM2, A1.CONJM2, A1.CONBPY, A1.CONJPY FROM ( SELECT T1.BUYID, T1.BUYDATE, T1.BUYGUBUN, T1.MANAGENO, T1.CITYCODE, (SELECT CITYNAME FROM ba_citymst WHERE CITYCODE = T1.CITYCODE) AS CITYNAME, T1.BOROUGHCODE, (SELECT BOROUGHNAME FROM ba_citydtl WHERE CITYCODE = T1.CITYCODE AND BOROUGHCODE = T1.BOROUGHCODE) AS BOROUGHNAME, T1.USETYPE, T1.ADDRESS, T1.OWNERNAME, T1.OWNERJUMINID, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONM2), 0) AS CONM2 FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGM2), 0) AS HOLDINGM2 FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID)) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONBM2, CAST((T1.BUYM2 - ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONM2), 0) AS CONM2 FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGM2), 0) AS HOLDINGM2 FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID))) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONJM2, CAST(((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONPY), 0) AS CONPY FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGPY), 0) AS HOLDINGPY FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID)) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONBPY, CAST((T1.BUYPY - ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN4.CONPY), 0) AS CONPY FROM sa_salemst IN4 WHERE IN4.BUYID = T1.BUYID) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN3.HOLDINGPY), 0) AS HOLDINGPY FROM mm_salesopentb IN3 WHERE IN3.BUYID = T1.BUYID))) AS DECIMAL(12, 0)) AS CONJPY FROM mm_buymst T1 WHERE 1=1) A1 WHERE 1=1 AND A1.CONJM2 > 0 ORDER BY A1.BUYID
